nodes.text: StarFries were a snack food served aboard the Kut-Rate Kruise Lines transport company's transport starship Reasonable Doubt. In the year 20 BBY, Chuck Bratz, a young non-Human passenger on the transport, was eating a serving of StarFries along with a carton of Fizzy-Bip, but put them down while playing the game Wookiee Warpath in the Kidz Arkade onboard the ship.
StarFries first appeared in Yoda: Dark Rendezvous, a novel written by Sean Stewart that was released in 2004.
